sentences.en: A great part of the Netherlands has now been impoldered.
sentences.cn: 目前荷兰有很大部分土地是围海开恳的.

sentences.en: A new submarine cable was laid from England to Netherlands.
sentences.cn: 英国至荷兰间铺设了新的海底电缆.

sentences.en: A remarkable aspect of the Netherlands is the flatness of the country.
sentences.cn: 平坦是荷兰地形最突出的特点.

sentences.en: Anne lived in Amsterdam in the Netherlands during World War II.
sentences.cn: 安妮住在荷兰的二战期间在阿姆斯特丹.

sentences.en: By contrast, the comparable figure for the Netherlands is 16 per cent.
sentences.cn: 相反，荷兰的相对数字为16%。

sentences.en: By elimination , then, the Netherlands was the only area in which Habsburg losses might be out.
sentences.cn: 如此权衡以后, 荷兰就是咯布斯堡可以减少损失的唯一地区了.

sentences.en: Clogs are part of the Netherlands national costume.
sentences.cn: 木屐是荷兰民族服装的一部分.

sentences.en: Flute, also known as Fluyt , is transport ship originating from the Netherlands.
sentences.cn: 长笛, 也被称为弗鲁特商船, 是一种产于尼德兰联邦的商船.

sentences.en: Foot - and - mouth disease has already spread to Ireland, France and the Netherlands, and possibly Germany.
sentences.cn: 口蹄 疫 已传播到爱尔兰 、 法国、荷兰, 可能还有德国.

sentences.en: He rendered the landscapes of the Netherlands with great skill and artistry.
sentences.cn: 他以高度技巧和艺术才能描绘了荷兰的风景。

sentences.en: I want a mountain, a real one. In the Netherlands.
sentences.cn: 我想要一个山峰，一个荷兰的真正的山。

sentences.en: Now that we're in Europe we ought to visit the Netherlands.
sentences.cn: 既然我们到了欧洲，就应当去荷兰。

sentences.en: Radio Netherlands, PO Box 222, Hilversum
sentences.cn: 希尔弗瑟姆邮政信箱222号，荷兰广播电台

sentences.en: Similar methods are used in advisory work in the Netherlands.
sentences.cn: 类似的方法也用于荷兰的农业咨询工作中.

sentences.en: So to come back to your question if the Netherlands inspired me in what I do.
sentences.cn: 回到你的问题上：荷兰大地是否赋予了我艺术创作的灵感？

sentences.en: The more obvious potential allies are Ireland, Denmark and, to a lesser degree, the Netherlands.
sentences.cn: 最可能成为盟国的有爱尔兰和丹麦，放宽些还可以把荷兰算上。

sentences.en: The Netherlands became , of course, an even greater drain upon general imperial revenues.
sentences.cn: 尼德兰当然是帝国总收入更大的耗费之地.

sentences.en: The Netherlands has been reclaiming farmland from water.
sentences.cn: 荷兰人一直在围海造地。

sentences.en: They call it New Amsterdam, the Netherlands in the name of Amsterdam.
sentences.cn: 他们把它叫做新阿姆斯特丹, 取名于荷兰的阿姆斯特丹.

sentences.en: Weeks later it wiped out fields in the Netherlands, Germany, Denmark and England.
sentences.cn: 几周以后它彻底横扫了荷兰、德国、丹麦和英格兰的田野。

phrases.tran_cn: 荷属安的列斯；荷属安的列斯群岛（拉丁美洲群岛）

trans.tran_en: A country in western Europe, on the North Sea
